#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
#define F(i,a,b) for(ll i=a;i<=b;i++)
#define ITR(x,c) for(__typeof(c.begin()) x=c.begin();x!=c.end();x++)
#define ALL(a) (a.begin()),(a.end())
#define ZERO(a) memset(a,0,sizeof(a))
#define mp make_pair
#define pb push_back 
#define X first
#define Y second
#define pi 3.14159265
#define MOD 1000000007  

string getS(ll k){
	
	string ok;
	
	while(k>=1)
	{
		ok+=k%2+'0';
		
		k/=2;
	}
	
	return ok;
	
}

string add(string &ok,string &l){
	
	reverse(l.begin(),l.end());
	
	int len1=ok.length();
	
	int len2=l.length();
	
	if(len1<len2){
		
		swap(ok,l);
		swap(len1,len2);
			
	}
	
	int i=0;
	
	int carry=0;
	
	string nw;
	
	while(1)
	{	
		if(carry!=0 || i<len1)
		{
			int num1=(i<len1)?(ok[i]-'0'):0;
			int num2=(i<len2)?(l[i]-'0'):0;
				
			int rem=(carry+num1+num2)%2;
			
			if(carry+num1+num2>=2)
			carry=1;
			else carry=0;
			
			nw+=rem+'0';
			
			i++;
		}
		
		else break;
			
	}
	
	reverse(nw.begin(),nw.end());
	
	return nw;
}

int main(){
	
	cin.sync_with_stdio(0);
	
	ll t;
	
	cin>>t;
	
	while(t--){
		
		string l;
		
		ll k;
		
		cin>>l;
		
		cin>>k;
			
		string p=getS(k);	
		
		cout<<add(p,l)<<"\n";
	}
	
	return 0;
}
